Name: Holy Joe Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
7.5 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: An Irish whiskey-based, bittersweet aperitif cocktail that works equally well as a nightcap.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2016 by John Robinson, beverage manager at The Hive in Bentonville, Arkansas.
Nutrition: One serving of Holy Joe Cocktail contains 180 calories
